LanguageData.TM_VitalityBoostHD.description: Physical boost acquired by draining the energy from a pawn during intimacy.
LanguageData.TM_DemonHD.label: Demonic Flames
LanguageData.TM_DemonHD.description: Demonic flames that swirl and writhe around the form of a demon.
LanguageData.TM_DemonicPriceHD.label: Soul Consumption
LanguageData.TM_DemonicPriceHD.description: Flames of destruction that will never cease until they consume the soul of this pawn.
LanguageData.TM_DemonScornHD.label: Demon's Scorn
LanguageData.TM_DemonScornHD.description: The partial transformation of a succubus into a demon; grants increased physical powers and absorbs damage.
